title: win2003 无法启动bat，求救
author: roanelg
txt_content:
could not reserve enough space for object heap
could not create the java virtual machine
a fatal exception has occurred .program will exit


　　不能保留足够的空间对象堆吗
　　无法创建java虚拟机
　　一个致命的异常发生。程序将退出
